reviewText: This is a truly inspirational DVD.  THe music of this group is wonderful.  I love this group, their music, and this DVD.
Title: Best of the Martins

reviewText: A great overview of the Martin's music ministry as well as glimpses into their personalities. I like their versatility and they exhibit a wide range of it here on this DVD. I wouldn't consider the Martins southern gospel as their sound is more contemporary but they have a love of the Lord and that comes across strong in their work and their lives. I recommend this DVD highly.
Title: Best of the Martins

reviewText: As I've said I Oder these gospel dvds for my parents.  This is an excellent one by this group.  Thanks.
Title: Best of the Martins

reviewText: The Martins can always be counted on to provide top notch harmony and inspiration that thrills your soul and brings joy.
Title: Best of the Martins

reviewText: The Martins' harmony has 'wowed' from the first time I heard them. On this dvd I was able to see the ease of their music is also who they are.Good choices of songs and review of the Gaither family years.Thanks for the music
Title: Best of the Martins
